Hoja de ruta

Esta pagina is not yet translated. If you would like to help translate it, please see the README.

  • Completed task

  • Ongoing task

  • Upcoming task

    2014

    2014-04-18: Launched on Bitcointalk

    2014-04-23: Renamed from Bitmonero to Monero

    2014-09-04: Recovered from a spam attack

    2014-09-12: Monero Research Lab Papers 1 and 2 published

    2014-09-25: Monero Research Lab Paper 3 published

    2014-12-08: 0.8.8.6 released

    2015

    2015-01-26: Monero Research Lab Paper 4 published

    2016

    2016-01-01: 0.9.0 Hydrogen Helix released

    2016-02-10: Monero Research Lab Paper 5 published

    2016-03-22: Hardfork to require minimum ringsize of 3 on all transactions

    2016-09-18: 0.10.0 Wolfram Warptangent released

    2016-09-21: Hardfork to split coinbase into denominations

    2016-12-14: 0.10.1 Wolfram Warptangent released

    2016-12-22: Official GUI Beta 1 released

    2017

    2017-01-05: Hardfork to enable RingCT transactions

    2017-02-22: 0.10.2 released; critical vulnerability patched

    2017-03-27: 0.10.3.1 Wolfram Warptangent released

    2017-04-15: Hardfork to adjust minimum blocksize and dynamic fee algorithm

    2017-07-04: Website redesigned

    2017-09-07: 0.11.0.0 Helium Hydra released

    2017-09-07: Fluffy blocks

    2017-09-10: GUI out of beta

    2017-09-15: Hardfork to increase minimum ringsize to 5 and require RingCT transactions

    September, 2017: 0MQ/ZeroMQ

    Fluffy blocks

    GUI port to android

    Forum Funding System redesign

    Subaddresses

    Multi-signatures (multisig)

    Kovri alpha release

    2018

    Additional MRL research papers

    Second-layer solutions for speed and scalability

    More efficient range proofs for RingCT to reduce transaction sizes

    Future
